articles.author: RT
articles.title: Surprise asteroid EVADES Earth protection satellites in one of the closest flybys ever recorded - RT
articles.description: A truck-sized asteroid has careened past Earth in one of the closest flybys ever recorded – but none of satellites scanning the skies to protect our planet saw the space rock coming.
articles.content:
The previously unseen asteroid, 2020 JJ, whizzed past at a distance of around 7,000 kilometers (4,350 miles) this week. In astronomical terms, that’s an incredibly close shave, and it makes it one of the closest passes of our planet ever recorded. 
In a deve… [+1243 chars]
